ewani daru dariyantath adhyapanayata wishesha dakshatha dakwana sisuntath shishyadhara atha hitha dime wadapiliwelak gampaha disthrikkaye kriyathmaka kala yayi mirigama shri lanka nidahas paksha sanwidhayaka wasantha senanayaka mahatha pawasiya.wasantha senanayaka padanama ha ekamuthu kantha bala mandalaya magin diwulapitiya kottasaye pasal sisun dedahasakata shishyadhara bedadima wenuwen marandagahamula sa.na.sa. ranga shalawe pawathi uthsawaya amathamin ee mahatha me bawa kiya.wasantha senanayaka mahatha meseda pawasiya.api mirigamin aarambha kala me shishyadhara labadima wadasatahana idiri sathi kihipaya athulatha gampaha aththanagalla dompe kottasa bala pradeshawalada kriyathmaka karanawa.

ehema thoragena karanne ee lamayinta bench eka issarahata awith sinduwak kiyanna dena eka, sindu kiyana lamayinta mayik allana eka, sinduwata anuwa natana eka, mokakhari tiwi eke yana ad ekak rangapala pennana eka, prasidda charithayak anukaranaya kirima, bench gane gihin badu wikunana eka wage dewal.

mata mathakayi api podiyi ethakota chandrika ge kale weddi rate palakayawa natewwe jathiwadi kuda paksha, muslim kongrasaya thondamange pakshaya wage...dan demala sandhanayath ekathu wela..munge kondesi uda natanawa arenna me rate rajayata karanna deyak na...eeka thamayi ape thibba kramaya..eeka nisa athi wechcha asahanaya nisa thamayi hela urumaya wage paksha athi wune...

eda shri rawana gagana bala senawe maha senewirath thanathura daru, rama yuddhaye awasan dinayedi, nyashtika awi rahas ketha athulath suraya nana kamaraye amathaka kara giya hethuwa nisa diwi puja kara pujaniya "shrirawanawiru" thathwaya himikaragaththa wu da, "kathandra kar" maha senewiya ge parapure wathman puruke jaiwa sandhistana samarumak edinata yedena athara, ihatha ki platinam thahaduwema adho lipiyaka dakwena paridi edinata sanwidhanaya kerena maha barthde (barth=baratha=bhumiya, de=dinaya, bhumiya dinu dinaya=upan dinayaya) melawata sahabhagiwima sandaha shri rawanayo thama shishira nidrawen awadiwa me hela dharanithalaye prathibhurtha wimata niyamithayi.
- mage manokaya.
kalanthe dayi matanam."

sewikawan dedenakuta welendasala thula athawara kala tharunayata apa ahangama - sugathapala diyagahage welenda sewikawan dedenakuta welendasala thuladima lingika athawara kala bawa kiyana ema welendasale sewakayaku rupiyal laksha dekaka sharira apamatha mudaharimata galla athireka mahesthrath gunendra kumara munasinha mahatha niyoga kaleya.

yasodarawo eyin mihithalaya mahath kampawak wanu athayi sitha budun wahansege parinirwanayata dewasarakata pera niwan magata piwisimata thiranaya kara edinama ee parinirwana dinayeda awasan warata budun pa kamala wanda sasara pura wu gaman magehi thaman athin yam waradak sidu wuye nam ema siyalu waradata paw kama kara dena lesa buduhimiyangen illa siti bawath, ee mohotha wana witath aya siyalu kelesun nasa sitha diyunu kara rahathwa athi bawa diwasin dutu budu radun yasodara rahath sthawiriyange illima was siyalu paw kama kalaha.

raki saha prawin piyanama nidahas kirimen pasu atharin pathara mathuwana balakirimak harennata thibu prabala bala kirima washpa wi gosini. (2009 mayi 19wana wita dahas gananak minis jiwitha polawa matha walali yana thek dakune boho ayath jathyanthara boho aayathanath bala sitiye da me lesaya.)

kohoma wunath je aar prathama widhayaka janadhipathi lesa path karapu (eya wisinmayi eya janadhipathi hatiyata path kale) 1977n passe kalayedi nam je aar kiyanne palakayaku langa thiyenna oona kapatikam siyallama thibunu, palakayaku langa nothibiya yuthu modakam kisiwak nothibunu purushayaku bawa nopakilawama kiyanna puluwani.
ape rajayata pasalwala loku sanwardhanayak aduma tharamin nawina lokayata galapena aakarayen nawikaranaya karamin thibenawa.

prawruththi wikashayak yanu rate jathika thorathuru wala wadagathma angayaki..lagadi sita me nalikawe puwath wenuwata yanne keti natyaya..lama apachara,horakam wani kriya rasakara puwath wikashaya thulata damanne wili lajjawak nomathiwaya..rate minisunta bas gasthu ihala giyath kamak natha..badu mila ihala giyath kamak natha..sarath hire giyath kamak natha...ee kisiwakin hithata dukak natha..namuth marwin silwa ,pabata banna wita,dayasirita kata kadichcha kathawak kiwa wita duka sithe..adayi..walapeyi..me mage rataya...mage rata mehemaya...ratata mehema karanne kunuharupa madhyakarayoya...kaluthara gage punchi daruwa pawi yana widiyo darshana pela obata mathaka athayi sithami...me madhya aayathanaya eya markat kara tharama eetath wada mathaka athayi sithami..polis praharayen muhude gili miya giya pudgalaya obata mathaka athayi sithami..eetath wada me madhya aayathanaya eya markat kala aakaraya mathaka athayi sithami...madhya yanu rataka watinama thorathuru laba ganna eekakayayi...eewa mese pissu kelinne wita mahajanathawa thanakola kana thathwayata dama wiya yuthuya..ape minisunta meya mathaka hitinne dawas 14k pamani...sinhalaya ehemaya..ee kiwwe welupille prabhakaranya...rajya nalika pissu kelina wita apa wenath nalika kihipayak gan wiswasa kalemu..eewada pissu kelina wita apa ka gana wishwasa karannada...kese ho apa iwasamu...thawa dawasakin marwin silwa amathithuma kiwahoth "mama ajithta gahuwe na..ajithmayi mata gahanna kiwe" kiya,apa eya piliganimu..ee mita perath mewanima dewala siduwi athi bawini...idin api sinasemu..apata mona prashnada..me ape siri lankawaya...idin dena deyak ka wena deyak balagena sitimu..........
ihatha 3 pilithuru anuwaya.
